parsing_result:
# Other Controls

Pressing the **AEL/AFL** button locks both focus and exposure.

- While the assigned control is pressed, pressing the shutter button halfway will not end the lock.
- If **AE&AF ON/OFF SWITCH** is selected for **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > AE/AF-LOCK MODE**, the lock can only be ended by pressing the control a second time.

!AEL/AFL button (AE/AF lock)

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**
> - The **AEL/AFL** button can be assigned other roles using **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > FUNCTION (Fn) SETTING**. Exposure and focus lock can also be assigned to other function buttons.
> - Exposure and focus lock can be performed separately by assigning them to different function buttons.
